I've been doing research on cache invalidation and have written up a post
about its benefits, some of the problems with it in practice, and a
potential solution to those problems

http://restafari.blogspot.com/2010/04/link-header-based-invalidation-of.html

All feedback welcome

Cheers,
Mike

--0016363b9f2a962e6d0486b576dd
